select id, group_name, name, position, contact, email from member where id in(SELECT favorite.target_id from member join favorite on member.id = favorite.id where member.id=#{id});
mapper.insert: insert into member values(id=#{id}, password=#{password}, name=#{name}, group_name=#{group_name}, position=#{position}, contact=#{contact}, email=#{email})
mapper.select: select target_id from favorite where id=#{id}
mapper.delete: delete from favorite where id=#{id} and target_id=#{target_id}
